ARTICLE ONE
DEFINITIONS
Section 1.01 Defined Terms
"Consolidated EBITDA" means EBITDA for the relevant period.
"Indebtedness" shall mean any debt for borrowed money.
ARTICLE SEVEN
NEGATIVE COVENANTS
Section 7.01 Indebtedness
(a) Debt under the Loan Documents is permitted.
(i) Such debt includes obligations under guaranties.
(b) Other debt is restricted.
